column1: Note:  In some cases, computers may have been shared by an agency with other users.
Agency-owned AFIS facilities are defined as including a file of digitized prints.
Remote-access terminal refers to any on-site terminal with access to a remote AFIS site.

Note:  In some cases, computers may have been shared by an agency with other users.
